name: The Legend of Beeb I: The Bricky Depths!
name_original: The Legend of Beeb I: The Bricky Depths!
description:
Alternative Title: Beeb on the Bricks

Beeb is your cool dude, he plays cool games, and likes to use an artifact unlike any other to execute such grandiose play. However, he accidentally napped for a bit after a game, and lost it. Now he found the rumored robbers! But how will he get it back? Through classic ASCII wackyness, of course.

Game mainly made for Linux systems! Could behave weirdly on Windows. Successfully works with Wine 5.0.
